transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji sir. Sir Roshan baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Ji Roshan ji bataiye.
Customer: Sir ek baat batao app wala sirf unke phone mein dikkat aa rahi hai ya aapke phone mein bhi dikkat aa rahi hai?
Executive: Dono phone mein dikkat aa rahi hai. In fact humne teesre phone mein bhi app download kiya.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur usme bhi login kiya. Same usme bhi aa raha hai.
Customer: Chalye koi nahi main karwa raha hun theek sir.
Executive: Char din ho gaye sir. Kafi time hota hai ye.
Customer: Sir wo Saturday Sunday fir off ho gaya tha. Koi team wale reply nahi kare. Subah se jab se aaya hun aap hi ke isme laga hua hun sir.
Executive: Nahi sir jis din Friday tha. Friday ke subah morning mein 7:00-8:00 baje humne
Customer: Haan aapne concern raise kara hua tha.
Executive: Ji. Humne us din team wagera ko bheja hua tha.
Executive: Right. To hum isko solve kara rahe hain. Priority pe hai aapka escalation. Please thoda time dijiye. Main isko solve kara ke aapko update karta hun.
Customer: Sir ab isme dekhiye ek bhi baj gaya subah humne unne bataya tha ki Saturday Sunday ki wajah se team available nahi hai. Chalo theek hai.
Customer: Sir subah se subah se teen char bar meri already unse discussion ho gayi hai sir ke sath mein. Sari ji ke sath mein.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Right meri already unke sath mein discussion chal rahi hai. To main bas ye janna chah raha tha ki aapke pass mein bhi matlab isi phone mein dikkat aa rahi hai ki ya kisi aur mein bhi dikkat aa rahi hai. Isiliye fir maine aapko call kara. Haan isiliye fir maine aapko call kara.
Executive: Humne un install kiya. Reinstall kiya. Fir se un install kiya. Reinstall kiya aur naye phone mein bhi install kiya. Waha pe bhi same problem aa raha hai. Sirf home page dikh raha hai. Jaise kisi bhi link pe maine unko parso video bhi share kiya tha.
Customer: Haan wo video bhi hamare pass mein aayi thi.
Executive: Ji. To kisi bhi link pe login matlab click karte hain to waha pe wahi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Main karwata hun sir aapka.
Executive: Please sir thoda sa emergency hai kyuki pe pata nahi kabhi kabhar kya click ho jata hai koi lead click ho jati hai. To fir wo bada nuksan ho jata hai.
Customer: Karwata hun karwata hun sir. Haan isko priority pe aaj hi karwa dijiye please.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir 100%.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- App issue occurring on multiple phones.

- Issue not resolved for four days.

- No team reply due to weekend.



Resolution:

- Executive assured issue is priority.

- Executive will solve and update the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will solve and update the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- app issue, resolution, priority, escalation
